TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase

summary.span: 表示用于显示命令按钮的特殊字段，这些按钮可在数据绑定控件中执行选择、编辑、插入或删除操作。

span.span: Represents a special field that displays command buttons to perform selecting, editing, inserting, or deleting operations in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是数据绑定控件使用的特殊字段 (如和) 若要显示执行删除的命令按钮，编辑、 插入或选择操作。The class is a special field used by data-bound controls (such as and ) to display command buttons that perform delete, edit, insert, or select operations. 要执行这些操作的命令按钮可以显示或隐藏使用下表中所示的属性。The command buttons to perform these operations can be shown or hidden using the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏在删除按钮字段的数据绑定控件中每个记录。Shows or hides a Delete button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 删除按钮允许用户从数据源中删除记录。The Delete button allows the user to delete a record from the data source.| ||显示或隐藏在一个编辑按钮字段的数据绑定控件中每个记录。Shows or hides an Edit button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 编辑按钮允许用户编辑数据源中的记录。The Edit button allows the user to edit a record from the data source. 当用户单击特定的记录，编辑的编辑按钮按钮被替换为更新按钮和取消按钮。When the user clicks the Edit button for a specific record, that Edit button is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button. 所有其他命令按钮也会隐藏。All other command buttons are also hidden.| ||显示或隐藏在新建按钮字段。Shows or hides the New button in a field. 新建按钮允许用户在数据源中插入新记录。The New button allows the user to insert a new record in the data source. 当用户单击新建按钮时，则使用插入按钮和一个取消按钮来替换它。When the user clicks the New button, it is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button. 所有其他命令按钮也会隐藏。All other command buttons are also hidden. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support inserting operations, such as the control.| ||显示或隐藏在选择按钮字段的数据绑定控件中每个记录。Shows or hides a Select button in a field for each record in the data-bound control. 选择按钮允许用户选择的数据绑定控件中的记录。The Select button allows the user to select a record in the data-bound control.| 此外，可以显示或隐藏通过设置取消按钮显示一条记录中编辑时或插入模式属性。In addition, the Cancel button displayed when a record is in edit or insert mode can be shown or hidden by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 数据绑定控件与数据源控件结合使用时 (如控件)，数据绑定控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动删除、 更新和插入功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete, update, and insert functionality. 对于其他数据源，您需要提供数据绑定控件的相应事件期间执行这些操作的例程。For other data sources, you need to provide the routines to perform these operations during the appropriate events for the data-bound control. 具体取决于使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示字段。The field is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used. 例如，控件显示字段为一列，而控件将其显示为一行。For example, the control displays a field as a column, while the control displays it as a row. 若要指定要显示的按钮类型，请使用属性。To specify the type of button to display, use the property. 当属性设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，可以指定要显示的按钮设置以下表中所示的属性的文本。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, you can specify the text to display for the buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||取消按钮的标题。The caption for the Cancel button.| ||删除按钮的标题。The caption for the Delete button.| ||编辑按钮的标题。The caption for the Edit button.| ||插入按钮的标题。The caption for the Insert button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||新按钮的标题。The caption for the New button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||选择按钮的标题。The caption for the Select button.| ||更新按钮的标题。The caption for the Update button.| 而不是显示命令按钮或链接按钮，可以通过设置显示一个图像按钮属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，并设置下表中所示的属性。Instead of displaying a command button or a link button, you can display an image button by setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the properties shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要为取消按钮显示的图像The image to display for the Cancel button| ||要显示的删除按钮的图像。The image to display for the Delete button.| ||要显示的编辑按钮的图像。The image to display for the Edit button.| ||要为插入按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the Insert button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||要显示的新建按钮的图像。The image to display for the New button. **注意：** 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。**Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control.| ||要选择的按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the Select button.| ||要为更新按钮显示的图像。The image to display for the Update button.| 默认情况下，当用户单击按钮在字段中，在页面上的所有验证控件执行验证。By default, when the user clicks a button in a field, validation is performed on all validation controls on the page. 若要防止在单击按钮时进行验证，将设置属性设置为`false`。To prevent validation from occurring when a button is clicked, set the property to `false`. 您可以隐藏通过设置数据绑定控件中的字段属性设置为`false`。You can hide a field in a data-bound control by setting the property to `false`. 字段可用于自定义其标头和表尾部分。The field allows you to customize its header and footer sections. 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示一个标题，请设置或属性，分别。To display a caption in the header or the footer section, set the or the property, respectively. 而不是显示文本的页眉节中，您可以通过设置中显示图像属性。Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the property. 若要隐藏中的标头部分对象，设置属性设置为`false`。To hide the header section in a object, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 一些数据绑定控件 (如控件) 可以显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。Some data-bound controls (such as the control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control. 不支持这些数据绑定控件针对个别按钮字段的属性。These data-bound controls do not support the property for an individual button field. 若要显示或隐藏数据绑定控件的整个标头部分 （如果可用），请使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性。To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property. 你还可以自定义外观通过设置该字段的不同部分的样式属性的对象 （字体颜色、 背景色等）。You also can customize the appearance of the object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field. 下表列出了不同的样式属性。The following table lists the different style properties. |样式属性Style property|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置对象。The style settings for the child Web server controls of the object.| ||脚注部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the footer section of the object.| ||标头部分的样式设置对象。The style settings for the header section of the object.| ||中的数据项的样式设置对象。The style settings for the data items in the object.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段来显示用来编辑中的记录控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a field to display controls to edit a record in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField2/CS/commandfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField2/VB/commandfield2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和可自定义编辑控件的文本属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and properties to customize the text for the editing controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/CS/commandfieldcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandField/VB/commandfieldvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 将字段添加到动态创建的数据绑定控件时，通常使用此构造函数。This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control. 若要动态添加字段的数据绑定控件，创建一个新对象，设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。To dynamically add a field to a data-bound control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection. 例如，如果使用的控件中，添加对象传递给集合。For example, if you are using the control, add the object to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 尽管您可以向数据绑定控件动态添加字段，但强烈建议，字段是静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate. 静态声明所有字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加字段列控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a field column to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CommandFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCtor/CS/commandfieldctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CommandFieldCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CommandFieldCtor/VB/commandfieldctorvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Image`，使用属性来指定要为取消按钮显示的图像。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the property to specify the image to display for the Cancel button. 此映像可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 为显示取消按钮图像的替代方法，可以通过第一个设置显示的文本属性设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，然后设置属性。As an alternative to displaying an image for the Cancel button, you can display text by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定自定义映像中的取消按钮显示字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display for a Cancel button in a field of a control. 属性必须设置为`ButtonType.Image`取消按钮可显示图像。The property must be set to `ButtonType.Image` for a Cancel button to display an image. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定中的按钮时是否执行验证单击字段。Use the property to specify whether validation is performed when a button in a field is clicked. 当此属性设置为`true`，默认情况下在页上的所有验证控件进行都验证。When this property is set to `true`, by default all validation controls on the page are validated. 若要限制对特定组的验证控件验证，创建验证组，并设置属性设置为验证组的名称。To limit validation to only a certain group of validation controls, create a validation group and then set the property to the validation group's name. 验证组的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on validation groups, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以防止发生中的按钮时验证单击字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent validation from occurring when a button in a field is clicked. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否在中显示一个删除按钮字段的数据源控件中的每个记录。Use the property to specify whether a Delete button is displayed in a field for each record in the data-source control. 删除按钮，可从数据源中删除一条记录。The Delete button allows you to remove a record from the data source. > [!NOTE] > 数据绑定控件与数据源控件结合使用时 (如控件)，数据绑定控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动删除功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete functionality. 对于其他数据源，必须提供数据绑定控件执行删除操作的相应事件期间的例程。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the delete operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当的属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示的删除按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a Delete button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示图像属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示每个记录中的删除按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a Delete button for each record in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否在显示的编辑按钮字段的数据源控件中的每个记录。Use the property to specify whether an Edit button is displayed in the field for each record in the data-source control. 编辑按钮可编辑的记录的值。The Edit button allows you to edit the values of a record. 当用户单击编辑按钮时，为每个字段的记录中显示输入的控件。When the user clicks an Edit button, input controls are displayed for each field in the record. 记录的编辑按钮替换为更新按钮和取消按钮，并记录所有其他命令按钮处于隐藏状态。The Edit button for the record is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons for the record are hidden. 单击更新按钮以在数据源的新值更新的记录，而单击取消按钮可取消该操作。Clicking the Update button updates the record with the new values in the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation. > [!NOTE] > 数据绑定控件与数据源控件结合使用时 (如控件)，数据绑定控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动更新功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality. 对于其他数据源，必须提供数据绑定控件执行更新操作的相应事件期间的例程。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the update operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当的属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要显示为编辑按钮的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for an Edit button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示图像属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示每个记录中的编辑按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an Edit button for each record in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否在中显示一个新按钮字段。Use the property to specify whether a New button is displayed in a field. 新建按钮一次只能显示在字段，并允许用户在数据源中添加一条新记录。The New button is displayed only once in the field and allows the user to add a new record in the data source. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于支持插入操作，例如数据绑定控件控件。This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the control. 当用户单击新建按钮时，为数据绑定控件，从而允许用户输入新记录的值中显示每个字段显示的输入的控件。When the user clicks the New button, input controls are displayed for each field displayed in the data-bound control, allowing the user to enter the values for the new record. 新建按钮替换为插入按钮和取消按钮，并在所有其他命令按钮隐藏字段。The New button is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons in the field are hidden. 单击插入按钮添加到数据源的记录，而单击取消按钮将取消该操作。Clicking the Insert button adds the record to the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation. > [!NOTE] > 数据绑定控件与数据源控件结合使用时 (如控件)，数据绑定控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动插入功能。When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic insert functionality. 对于其他数据源，必须提供数据绑定控件执行插入操作的相应事件期间的例程。For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the insert operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control. 当的属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要为新按钮显示的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a New button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示图像属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示在一个新按钮控件，这样用户就可以将一条新记录添加到数据源。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a New button in a control, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否在显示选择按钮字段的数据源控件中的每个记录。Use the property to specify whether a Select button is displayed in a field for each record in the data-source control. 选择按钮允许用户在数据源控件中选择一行。The Select button allows the user to select a row in the data-source control. 单击选择按钮的一条记录时，相应地做出响应的数据源控件。When the Select button for a record is clicked, the data-source control responds accordingly. 例如，控制更新， ， ，和对应于所选行的值的属性。For example, a control updates the , , , and properties to values corresponding to the selected row. 到所选行然后应用样式和和引发事件。The style is then applied to the selected row and the and events are raised. 当的属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，使用属性来指定要选择的按钮显示的文本。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the property to specify the text to display for a Select button. 或者，可以通过第一个设置显示图像属性设置为`ButtonType.Image`，然后设置属性。Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示每个记录中的选择按钮控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a Select button for each record in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的属性字段设置为`ButtonType.Image`，使用属性来指定要显示为更新按钮的图像。When the property of a field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the property to specify the image to display for an Update button. 此映像可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format. > [!NOTE] > 作为显示为更新按钮图像的替代方法，可以通过第一个设置显示的文本属性设置为`ButtonType.Button`或`ButtonType.Link`，然后设置属性。As an alternative to displaying an image for an Update button, you can display text by first setting the property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定自定义映像中的更新按钮显示字段控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a custom image to display for an Update button in a field of a control. 属性必须设置为`ButtonType.Image`为更新按钮可显示图像。The property must be set to `ButtonType.Image` for an Update button to display an image. summary.span: 确定包含在 对象中的控件是否支持回调。

span.span: Determines whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用来确定控件是否包含在一个帮助器方法对象支持回调。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 类显示选择按钮时不支持回发。The class does not support callbacks when the Select button is displayed. 实现此方法会引发异常时显示选择按钮。This method has been implemented to throw a exception when the Select button is displayed. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: 在 对象中显示“选择”按钮。

span.span: The Select button is displayed in the object.

exception.span: 当显示“选择”按钮时， 类支持回调。

span.span: The class does support callbacks when the Select button is displayed.

para.span: 派生的类类可以重写此方法，以指示是否通过字段支持回调所包含的控件。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指示支持回调，实现此方法作为空方法，不会引发异常;否则，使用有用的消息说明为什么不支持回调引发异常。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
